data.message: Can you please remove the secret conversation in messenger?? Pls don't tolerate or help cheaters. You are ruining a family/relationship. We are doing our best tochange a cheater and not have a secret conversation with someone. Please remove this secret conversation. Many people are so scared that their partner might try it.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Nicole. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs.  -Rhea

I don't understand, Nicole. Are you suggesting that Messenger should be made open, for everyone to see? I thought the idea of Messenger was to allow friends to have private conversations out of the public eye.
